title: New: Craft Spells – After The Moment/Love Well Spent
body:
![](http://c3.ac-images.myspacecdn.com/images02/116/l_05de0a769f894aba9a827e0561dc1226.jpg "Craft Spells")

Hailing from California, Craft Spells create addictive and upbeat pop tracks, perfectly engineered for warm, relaxing summer days. New single After The Moment is no exception, being inexplicably simple but effective, allowing the vocals to lull the listener into a hypnotic trance. At heart it’s a love song, yet it provides much more, danceable and energetic, it’s blissful melody is a joy to behold. B-Side Love Well Spent continues in a similar vein, repetitive synths and combined female (courtesy of Emily Reo) and male vocals add an extra dimension to the track.

 [Craft Spells :: After the Moment](http://soundcloud.com/beachtapes/craft-spells-after-the-moment) by [Beachtapes](http://soundcloud.com/beachtapes)
